sentences: This item (FCCC/SBI/2015/4 and Add.1, 9, and MISC.1) was first considered on 1 June.

On Chair Yauvoli’s proposal, parties agreed to back-to-back informal consultations on the sub-items on capacity building under the Convention and the Kyoto Protocol, co-facilitated by Bubu Jallow (The Gambia) and Kunihiko Shimada (Japan).
